additives.name: Monosodium Glutamate
additives.description: Flavor enhancer, may cause sensitivity in some people

flags.message: Contains 53% of daily sodium in one packet
flags.message_hindi: एक पैकेट में दैनिक सोडियम का 53%

flags.message: NOVA Group 4 - Ultra-processed food

safe_limit.explanation: Limit to 38g to stay within sodium limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: 38g tak hi khao, sodium ke liye.

roast.text: Ready in 2 minutes, heart patient in 2 decades. The tastemaker packet has so much sodium — if they'd labeled it 'salt packet' at least it would be honest. Giving this to kids daily? Start practicing their BP chart now.
roast.text_hindi: Do minute mein tayaar, do decade mein dil ka mareez. Tastemaker mein itna sodium hai ke 'namak ki potli' likhte to kam se kam imandaari hoti.

flags.message: 39% sugar - Ingredient #1 is sugar

safe_limit.explanation: Limit to 103g to stay within calories limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: 103g tak hi khao, calories ke liye.

roast.text: You're paying ₹235 to add sugar to milk and call it 'brain food.' Ingredient #1 is literally sugar. Milk solids show up at position 5. The kid in the advertisement grew up despite this product, not because of it.
roast.text_hindi: ₹235 de kar doodh mein cheeni mila rahe ho aur use 'brain food' bol rahe ho. Ingredient number 1: cheeni. Ad wala bachha iske baawajood bada hua.

flags.message: High sodium content - 40% daily value per 100g
NOVA Group 4 - Ultra-processed

safe_limit.explanation: Limit to 31g to stay within saturated fat limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: 31g tak hi khao, saturated fat ke liye.

roast.text: That 'tedha hai par mera hai' attitude? Your arteries don't share it. 30% fat, engineered to make you eat the whole packet. The crunch is designed in a lab to override your brain's 'stop eating' signal.
roast.text_hindi: Wo 'tedha hai par mera hai' attitude? Aapki arteries ko ye pasand nahi. 30% fat, poora packet khatam karne ke liye engineer kiya gaya.

flags.message: 26% sugar plus invert syrup

safe_limit.explanation: Limit to 63g to stay within saturated fat limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: 63g tak hi khao, saturated fat ke liye.

roast.text: India's most loved biscuit. Also India's most normalized sugar delivery system. 2-3 biscuits with chai seems innocent until you do it 3 times a day. That's 40% of your daily sugar just from biscuits.
roast.text_hindi: India ka sabse pyaara biscuit. Aur sabse normalized cheeni delivery system. 2-3 biscuit chai ke saath din mein 3 baar = 40% daily sugar sirf biscuit se.

additives.name: Caramel Color (Sulfite Ammonia)
additives.description: Contains 4-MEI, a potential carcinogen in high amounts

flags.message: 32g sugar in one bottle - 64% of daily limit

safe_limit.explanation: You can eat the whole packet without exceeding recommended daily limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: Pura packet kha sakte ho, daily limit cross nahi hogi.

roast.text: 10 teaspoons of sugar dissolved in fizzy water. That's what you're buying. The caffeine keeps you addicted, the sugar spikes your insulin, the phosphoric acid attacks your bones. Refresh ho gaya?
roast.text_hindi: 10 chamach cheeni fizzy paani mein. Yahi khareed rahe ho. Caffeine addiction, sugar se insulin spike, phosphoric acid se haddiyan weak. Refresh ho gaya?

safe_limit.explanation: Very limited portion recommended. Just 8g due to high saturated fat.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: Bahut kam khana chahiye. Sirf 8g kyunki saturated fat zyada hai.

roast.text: Utterly butterly delicious, utterly butterly 52% saturated fat. It's a condiment, not a food group. That thick layer on your paratha? Your heart sees it even if you don't.
roast.text_hindi: Utterly butterly delicious, utterly butterly 52% saturated fat. Ye condiment hai, food group nahi. Parathe pe wo moti layer? Dil dekhta hai chahe aap na dekho.

alternatives.name: Ghee (clarified butter)
alternatives.reason: Traditional, no salt, better for cooking

flags.message: 30% of daily sodium in one small packet

safe_limit.explanation: You can eat the whole packet without exceeding recommended daily limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: Pura packet kha sakte ho, daily limit cross nahi hogi.

roast.text: Just potatoes, oil, and salt - sounds innocent. But 34% fat means you're basically eating deep-fried potatoes shaped into thin discs. The packet says 'sharing size' but we all know how that ends.
roast.text_hindi: Sirf aloo, tel, namak - innocent lagta hai. Par 34% fat matlab deep-fried aloo patli disc mein. Packet pe 'sharing size' likha hai par sab jaante hain kya hota hai.

flags.message: Very high sodium - 47% daily value per 100g

safe_limit.explanation: Very limited portion recommended. Just 29g due to high saturated fat.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: Bahut kam khana chahiye. Sirf 29g kyunki saturated fat zyada hai.

roast.text: The official snack of 'just ek aur mutthi.' Problem is, that mutthi has 10% of your daily sodium. By the time you've eaten half the packet while watching TV, your kidneys are filing for overtime.
roast.text_hindi: Official snack 'just ek aur mutthi' ka. Problem ye hai ke us mutthi mein 10% daily sodium hai. TV dekhte dekhte aadha packet khatam, kidneys overtime maang rahi hain.

flags.message: 24% sugar plus invert syrup

safe_limit.explanation: Limit to 44g to stay within saturated fat limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: 44g tak hi khao, saturated fat ke liye.

roast.text: Those tiny cashew bits you're paying extra for? About 3% of the cookie. The rest is the same sugar-flour-oil trinity as any other biscuit. Good Day? More like Sugar Day.
roast.text_hindi: Wo chhote chhote cashew ke tukde jiske liye extra de rahe ho? Cookie ka 3%. Baaki wahi sugar-flour-oil combo. Good Day? Sugar Day bolo.

flags.message: Contains added sugar despite being called 'juice'

safe_limit.explanation: Limit to 833g to stay within calories limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: 833g tak hi khao, calories ke liye.

roast.text: It says 'fruit' on the label 17 times, but actual fruit content? Maybe 10%. The rest is water, concentrate, and added sugar. You're paying ₹120 for what a ₹5 orange would give you better.
roast.text_hindi: Label pe 'fruit' 17 baar likha hai, par actual fruit? Shayad 10%. Baaki paani, concentrate, aur added sugar. ₹120 mein wo le rahe ho jo ₹5 ka santra behtar deta.

flags.message: 32% sugar - designed to taste like chocolate dessert

safe_limit.explanation: Limit to 104g to stay within calories limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: 104g tak hi khao, calories ke liye.

roast.text: Breakfast of champions? More like dessert before school. 32% sugar means a bowl of Chocos has as much sugar as a chocolate bar. The 'added vitamins' don't cancel out the sugar crash at 11am.
roast.text_hindi: Champions ka breakfast? School se pehle dessert bolo. 32% sugar matlab ek bowl Chocos = ek chocolate bar. 'Added vitamins' 11 baje ka sugar crash nahi rokenge.

alternatives.name: Plain oats with honey
alternatives.reason: Control the sugar, add real nutrition

flags.message: 66g sugar in full bottle - 132% of daily limit

safe_limit.explanation: You can eat the whole packet without exceeding recommended daily limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: Pura packet kha sakte ho, daily limit cross nahi hogi.

roast.text: Taste the thunder, feel the diabetes. 600ml = 16 teaspoons of sugar. The 'toofan' they're talking about? That's your blood sugar levels. Aaj kuch TOOFANI karte hain is not medical advice.
roast.text_hindi: Taste the thunder, feel the diabetes. 600ml = 16 chamach cheeni. Jo 'toofan' ki baat kar rahe hain? Wo aapka blood sugar hai.

products.name: Parle Hide & Seek Chocolate Chip Cookies
products.name_hindi: पार्ले हाइड एंड सीक चॉकलेट चिप कुकीज़

flags.message: 28% sugar - almost 1/3 of the cookie is sugar

safe_limit.explanation: Limit to 40g to stay within saturated fat limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: 40g tak hi khao, saturated fat ke liye.

roast.text: Hide & Seek? The chocolate chips are definitely hiding. What you'll find easily is 28% sugar and 23% fat. The 'seek' part is looking for actual nutrition in this cookie.
roast.text_hindi: Hide & Seek? Chocolate chips definitely chhupe hue hain. Jo easily milega: 28% sugar aur 23% fat. 'Seek' karna padega actual nutrition dhundhne ke liye.

flags.message: Added sugar on top of natural fruit sugars

safe_limit.explanation: Limit to 667g to stay within calories limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: 667g tak hi khao, calories ke liye.

roast.text: At least it has real mango pulp - but then they added sugar on top of the natural sugars. One glass = half your daily sugar budget. Just eat a mango instead - you'll get the fiber your intestines are begging for.
roast.text_hindi: Kam se kam isme real mango pulp hai - par uske upar added sugar bhi hai. Ek glass = aadha din ki sugar budget. Seedha aam khao - fiber milega jo aapki intestines maang rahi hain.

flags.message: 35% sugar - Sugar is literally the first ingredient

safe_limit.explanation: Limit to 44g to stay within saturated fat limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: 44g tak hi khao, saturated fat ke liye.

roast.text: Milk's favorite cookie? More like dentist's favorite patient. Ingredient #1: Sugar. That cream you're twisting and licking? Pure vegetable fat mixed with more sugar. The ritual is fun; the nutrition is a crime.
roast.text_hindi: Milk ka favorite cookie? Dentist ka favorite patient bolo. Ingredient #1: Sugar. Wo cream jo twist aur lick kar rahe ho? Pure vegetable fat aur zyada sugar.

additives.name: Sodium Benzoate
additives.description: May form benzene when combined with Vitamin C

flags.message: 14% sugar - sweet water with mango flavor

safe_limit.explanation: You can eat the whole packet without exceeding recommended daily limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: Pura packet kha sakte ho, daily limit cross nahi hogi.

roast.text: Mango Frooti, fresh and juicy? Check the ingredients: Water first, sugar second, mango third. You're giving your kids sugar water with mango perfume. A real mango costs ₹20 and won't need preservatives.
roast.text_hindi: Mango Frooti, fresh and juicy? Ingredients dekho: Paani pehle, cheeni doosra, aam teesra. Bachon ko de rahe ho cheeni ka paani mango perfume ke saath. Asli aam ₹20 ka hai aur preservatives nahi chahiye.

flags.message: 32% sugar plus maltose from malted barley

safe_limit.explanation: Limit to 106g to stay within calories limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: 106g tak hi khao, calories ke liye.

roast.text: Taller, stronger, sharper? The science says: 32% sugar. The protein is real (11g), but you're paying for it with nearly as much sugar. Malted barley sounds healthy until you realize it's basically pre-digested sugar.
roast.text_hindi: Taller, stronger, sharper? Science kehta hai: 32% sugar. Protein asli hai (11g), par utni hi sugar ke saath. Malted barley healthy lagta hai jab tak samajh na aaye ke ye basically pre-digested sugar hai.

flags.message: 56% sugar - more than half the jar is sugar

safe_limit.explanation: Limit to 42g to stay within saturated fat limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: 42g tak hi khao, saturated fat ke liye.

roast.text: That 'hazelnut spread' is 56% sugar and only 13% hazelnuts. You're paying ₹375 for glorified chocolate frosting. The jar looks like it lasts weeks; at recommended servings, it lasts a month. We all know how that goes.
roast.text_hindi: Ye 'hazelnut spread' 56% sugar hai aur sirf 13% hazelnuts. ₹375 de rahe ho chocolate frosting ke liye. Jar lagta hai weeks chalega; recommended serving pe month. Par sab jaante hain kya hota hai.

safe_limit.explanation: Limit to 109g to stay within calories limits.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: 109g tak hi khao, calories ke liye.

roast.text: Finally, a product with one ingredient. No hidden sugars, no additives, no marketing tricks. Just oats. What you add to it is your choice - and your responsibility. Don't drown it in sugar.
roast.text_hindi: Finally, ek product jisme sirf ek ingredient hai. Koi chhupa hua sugar nahi, koi additives nahi. Sirf oats. Usme kya milate ho - wo aapki choice hai aur zimmedaari bhi.

flags.message: 52% sugar - more than half the bar

safe_limit.explanation: Very limited portion recommended. Just 23g due to high saturated fat.
safe_limit.explanation_hindi: Bahut kam khana chahiye. Sirf 23g kyunki saturated fat zyada hai.

roast.text: Silk = smoother texture = more fat + more sugar. 52% sugar, 32% fat. That silky feeling in your mouth? It's cocoa butter mixed with sugar melting. The entire bar is meant to last 10 days. You'll eat it in 10 minutes.
roast.text_hindi: Silk = smoother texture = zyada fat + zyada sugar. 52% sugar, 32% fat. Wo silky feeling muh mein? Cocoa butter aur sugar pighal rahi hai. Poori bar 10 din ke liye hai. Aap 10 minute mein khatam karoge.
